metadata.titleEn: The SRTM digital elevation dataset of the Tibetan Plateau (2000)
metadata.titleCn: 青藏高原SRTM数字高程数据集（2000）
metadata.description:
The SRTM (Shuttle Radar Topography Mission) data were obtained from the Endeavour space shuttle jointly launched by NASA and NIMA in February 2000. The SRTM system on the Endeavour had been collecting data for 222 hours and 23 minutes. It covered more than 80% of the global land surface from 60° north latitude to 56° south Latitude, including the whole territory of China. The radar image data acquired by the program have been processed for more than two years to form a digital terrain elevation model.
The raw data of this data set were downloaded from the SRTM data distribution website (http://srtm.csi.cgiar.org). For the convenience of using the data, based on the framing of STRM data, we use Erdas software to splice and prepare the STMR mosaic of the Tibetan Plateau.
The accuracy is 30 meters, and the data are in geoTIFF format.
The raw data of this data set was downloaded from the SRTM data distribution website (http://srtm.csi.cgiar.org).
The SRTM data provides a file for each latitude and longitude square. There are two kinds of longitude files, which are 1 arc-second and 3 arc-second, denoted SRTM1 and SRTM3, or 30-m and 90-m data. This data set comprises SRTM3 data with a resolution of 90 m, and the version is SRTM V4.1 (GeoTIFF format).
metadata.descriptionCn:
SRTM（Shuttle Radar Topography Mission，即航天飞机雷达地形测绘任务）数据，2000年2月由美国太空总署(NASA)和国防部国家测绘局(NIMA)联合发射的“奋进”号航天飞机测量得到，“奋进”号上搭载的SRTM系统共计进行了222小时23分钟的数据采集工作，获取北纬60度至南纬56度之间，覆盖全球陆地表面的80%以上，覆盖中国全境。该计划获取的雷达影像数据经过两年多的处理，制成了数字地形高程模型。
本数据集原始数据下载自SRTM数据分发网站（http://srtm.csi.cgiar.org）。为了便于用户使用数据，在分幅STRM数据的基础上，我们使用erdas软件进行拼接制备青藏高原STRM镶嵌图。
精度30米，数据格式为geotif格式。
本数据集的原始数据下载于SRTM数据分发网站（http://srtm.csi.cgiar.org ）
SRTM数据每经纬度方格提供一个文件，经度有1 arc-second和3 arc-second两种，称作SRTM1与SRTM3，或者称作30m与90m数据。本数据集为90m分辨率的SRTM3数据，数据版本SRTM V4.1（Geotiff格式）。

background: The Shuttle Radar Topography Mission produced the most complete, highest-resolution digital elevation model of the Earth. The project was a joint endeavor of NASA, the National Geospatial-Intelligence Agency, and the German and Italian Space Agencies and flew in February 2000. At the foundation of modern geosciences, quite literally, is knowledge of the shape of the Earth’s surface. Conventional topographic mapping technologies have produced maps of uneven quality: some with astounding accuracy, some far less adequate. It has proven exceedingly difficult and expensive to produce a global map set or digital elevation model of consistent scale and resolution by conventional means. The emergence, in the 1990s, of synthetic aperture radar (SAR) interferometry placed the possibility of efficiently and affordably creating a global digital elevation model within the grasp of spacefaring nations. Interferometric SAR, or InSAR, makes use of phase-difference measurements derived from two radar images acquired with a very small base to height ratio (typically 0.0002) to measure topography.
research objective: The SRTM objective was to acquire a digital elevation model of all land between about 60° north latitude and 56° south latitude, about 80% of Earth’s land surface. The operational goal of C radar was to generate contiguous mapping coverage as called for by the mission objectives. X radar was included as an experimental demonstration. As it did not employ ScanSAR, the X band radar had a slightly higher resolution and better signal-to-noise ratio (SNR) than the C band system. The key to successful acquisition of a data set suitable for automated production is to remove the variability and decorrelation due to pass-to-pass observations and to measure the interferometer baseline and other systematic effects accurately at all times during data acquisition.
challenges: Conventional topographic mapping technologies have produced maps of uneven quality: some with astounding accuracy, some far less adequate. Furthermore, the global coverage has been uneven. It has proven exceedingly difficult and expensive to produce a global map set or digital elevation model of consistent scale and resolution by conventional means. Optical stereo mapping systems suffer from poor control and matching difficulties in areas of low contrast and from persistent cloud cover in many important areas of the world.
methods: Following the launch, the first 12 hours of flight were taken up by on-orbit checkout (OOCO), during which the payload bay doors were opened, the SRTM system was activated and checked, and the orbiter was maneuvered to the mapping attitude. Mapping continued for 149 orbits (222.4 hours). Data were acquired at the rate of 180 megabits per second (Mbps) (C radar) and at 90 Mbps (X radar). Selected snapshots of data necessary for near-real-time performance assessment were down linked via the shuttle Ku band and NASA’s tracking and data relay system (TDRS) link to JPL in Pasadena and to the Payload Operations Control Center (POCC) in Houston.
dataset: A total of 765 data takes were executed. Of these, 399 were C radar only, 1 was X radar only, and 365 were simultaneous C and X radar. The volume of data produced by SRTM, 12.3 Tb (8.6 Tb by C radar, 3.7 Tb by X radar), compares to the capacity of the Library of Congress.
backgroundCn: 航天飞机雷达地形测量任务（Shuttle Radar Topography Mission）产生了地球上最完整、最高分辨率的数字高程模型。该项目是美国国家航空航天局（NASA）、国家地理空间情报局（National Geospatial-Intelligence Agency）以及德国和意大利航天局的联合努力，飞行于2000年2月。现代地球科学的基础，字面上说，就是对地球表面形状的了解。传统的地形测绘技术产生的地图质量参差不齐：有些地图准确度惊人，而有些则远远不够。通过传统手段，制作一套全球范围内一致比例和分辨率的地图集或数字高程模型一直非常困难且昂贵。1990年代合成孔径雷达（SAR）干涉测量技术的出现，使得空间国家能够高效且经济地创建全球数字高程模型成为可能。干涉SAR（InSAR）利用从两个以非常小的基高比（通常为0.0002）获取的雷达图像中得出的相位差测量来测量地形。
research objectiveCn: SRTM的目标是获取位于大约60°北纬和56°南纬之间的所有陆地的数字高程模型，覆盖地球约80%的陆地表面。C波段雷达的操作目标是生成连续的映射覆盖，以满足任务目标。X波段雷达作为实验演示被纳入其中。由于它没有采用ScanSAR，X波段雷达的分辨率略高，信噪比（SNR）也优于C波段系统。成功获取适合自动化生产的数据集的关键在于消除由于逐次观测造成的变异性和去相关性，并在数据采集期间始终准确测量干涉仪基线和其他系统效应。
challengesCn: 传统的地形测绘技术产生了质量不均的地图：有些地图准确度惊人，有些则远不够。此外，全球覆盖也不均匀。通过传统手段制作一致规模和分辨率的全球地图集或数字高程模型已被证明极其困难且昂贵。光学立体测绘系统在对比度低的地区存在控制和匹配困难，并且在许多重要地区受到持续云层覆盖的影响。
methodsCn: 在发射后的前12小时，进行了在轨检查（OOCO），期间打开了有效载荷舱门，激活并检查了SRTM系统，并将航天器调整到测绘姿态。测绘持续了149个轨道（222.4小时）。数据以每秒180兆比特（Mbps）（C雷达）和90 Mbps（X雷达）的速度获取。通过航天飞机的Ku波段和NASA的跟踪与数据中继系统（TDRS）链接，将必要的实时性能评估数据快照下传至位于帕萨迪纳的喷气推进实验室（JPL）和位于休斯顿的有效载荷操作控制中心（POCC）。
datasetCn: 总共执行了765个数据采集。其中，399个是仅C雷达，1个是仅X雷达，365个是同时进行的C和X雷达。SRTM产生的数据量为12.3 Tb（C雷达为8.6 Tb，X雷达为3.7 Tb），与美国国会图书馆的容量相当。

Verification.QuestionEn: Is it true that traditional optical stereo mapping systems face challenges in areas with low contrast and high cloud cover?
Verification.QuestionCn: 传统光学立体测绘系统在低对比度和高云层覆盖的区域面临挑战吗？

Disjunctive.QuestionEn: Is the primary method for collecting digital elevation data through synthetic aperture radar interferometry, optical stereo mapping, or another technique?
Disjunctive.QuestionCn: 收集数字高程数据的主要方法是通过合成孔径雷达干涉测量、光学立体测绘或其他技术吗？
Disjunctive.AnswerCn: 合成孔径雷达干涉测量

Disjunctive.QuestionEn: Which challenge is more significant in creating a global digital elevation model: uneven global coverage or matching difficulties in areas of low contrast?
Disjunctive.QuestionCn: 在创建全球数字高程模型时，哪个挑战更为显著：全球覆盖不均还是在低对比度区域的匹配困难？

Concept Completion.QuestionEn: What is the purpose of the Shuttle Radar Topography Mission (SRTM) in data collection?
Concept Completion.QuestionCn: 航天飞机雷达地形测量任务（SRTM）的数据收集目的是什么？

Concept Completion.QuestionEn: Where does the data collection coverage of the SRTM extend globally?
Concept Completion.QuestionCn: SRTM的数据收集覆盖范围在全球哪里？

Example.QuestionEn: Can you provide an example of a data collection method used to create a global digital elevation model efficiently and affordably?
Example.QuestionCn: 您能否提供一个用于高效且经济地创建全球数字高程模型的数据收集方法的示例？
Example.AnswerEn: The Shuttle Radar Topography Mission utilized synthetic aperture radar (SAR) interferometry, which uses phase-difference measurements from two radar images acquired with a very small base to height ratio, to efficiently and affordably create a global digital elevation model.
Example.AnswerCn: 航天飞机雷达地形测量任务利用合成孔径雷达（SAR）干涉测量，通过从两个以非常小的基线高度比获取的雷达图像中测量相位差，高效且经济地创建全球数字高程模型。

Example.QuestionEn: What is an example of a challenge faced when producing a global digital elevation model using conventional topographic mapping technologies?
Example.QuestionCn: 使用传统地形测绘技术生产全球数字高程模型时面临的一个挑战是什么？
Example.AnswerEn: Conventional topographic mapping technologies often produce maps of uneven quality and face significant challenges in achieving consistent scale and resolution globally. Optical stereo mapping systems, for instance, struggle with poor control and matching in areas with low contrast and persistent cloud cover.
Example.AnswerCn: 传统的地形测绘技术往往产生质量不均的地图，并在全球范围内实现一致的比例和分辨率方面面临重大挑战。例如，光学立体测绘系统在对比度低和持续云层覆盖的地区，控制和匹配的效果较差。

Example.QuestionEn: Could you provide an example of a dataset generated from a radar mapping mission that aimed to cover a significant portion of Earth's land surface?
Example.QuestionCn: 您能否提供一个来自雷达测绘任务生成的数据集的示例，该任务旨在覆盖地球陆地表面的显著部分？
Example.AnswerEn: The Shuttle Radar Topography Mission (SRTM) acquired a dataset covering about 80% of Earth's land surface between 60° north latitude and 56° south latitude, producing 12.3 terabytes of data using both C radar and X radar systems.
Example.AnswerCn: 航天飞机雷达地形测量任务（SRTM）获取了覆盖地球约80%陆地表面的数据，范围从北纬60°到南纬56°，使用C波段雷达和X波段雷达系统共产生了12.3太字节的数据。

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What are the characteristics of topographic data collected using synthetic aperture radar interferometry (InSAR)?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 使用合成孔径雷达干涉测量（InSAR）收集的地形数据有哪些特征？
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: phase-difference measurements, small base to height ratio, global digital elevation model, consistent scale and resolution, covers 80% of Earth's land surface between 60° north and 56° south latitude
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: 相位差测量，小基高比，全球数字高程模型，一致的比例和分辨率，覆盖地球表面80%的陆地，范围在北纬60°到南纬56°之间。

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What specific challenges are associated with the collection of global digital elevation data?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 与全球数字高程数据的收集相关的具体挑战有哪些？
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: uneven quality, inconsistent global coverage, expense of conventional mapping methods, poor control, matching difficulties in low-contrast areas, persistent cloud cover
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: 质量不均衡、全球覆盖不一致、传统测绘方法费用高、控制不佳、低对比度区域匹配困难、持续的云层覆盖

Quantification.QuestionEn: How many hours were dedicated to data collection during the Shuttle Radar Topography Mission?
Quantification.QuestionCn: 在航天飞机雷达地形测量任务中，数据收集共投入了多少小时？

Quantification.QuestionEn: What percentage of Earth's land surface was covered by the digital elevation model acquired during the mission?
Quantification.QuestionCn: 在任务期间获取的数字高程模型覆盖了地球陆地表面的百分之多少？

Quantification.QuestionEn: What was the data acquisition rate for the C radar system on the SRTM mission?
Quantification.QuestionCn: SRTM任务中C波段雷达系统的数据采集速率是多少？

Definition.QuestionEn: What is synthetic aperture radar (SAR) interferometry, and how is it utilized in topographic data collection?
Definition.QuestionCn: 什么是合成孔径雷达(SAR)干涉测量，它如何用于地形数据收集？
Definition.AnswerEn: Synthetic aperture radar (SAR) interferometry, or InSAR, is a technique that uses phase-difference measurements derived from two radar images acquired with a very small base to height ratio (typically 0.0002) to measure topography. It allows for the efficient and affordable creation of a global digital elevation model by capturing high-resolution data from space.
Definition.AnswerCn: 合成孔径雷达干涉测量（SAR干涉测量，或称InSAR）是一种利用从两幅雷达图像中获得的相位差测量来测量地形的技术，这两幅图像的基线与高度比非常小（通常为0.0002）。它通过从太空捕获高分辨率数据，能够高效且经济地创建全球数字高程模型。

Definition.QuestionEn: What are the primary challenges associated with conventional topographic mapping technologies, and how does radar interferometry address these challenges?
Definition.QuestionCn: 传统地形测绘技术面临的主要挑战有哪些，雷达干涉测量如何解决这些挑战？
Definition.AnswerEn: Conventional topographic mapping technologies have produced maps of uneven quality, with some maps being exceedingly accurate and others less adequate. The global coverage has also been inconsistent. Optical stereo mapping systems, in particular, suffer from poor control and matching difficulties in areas of low contrast and persistent cloud cover. Radar interferometry, such as that used in the SRTM mission, overcomes these challenges by providing consistent and high-resolution data unaffected by cloud cover and lighting conditions.
Definition.AnswerCn: 传统的地形测绘技术产生的地图质量参差不齐，有些地图极为准确，而另一些则不够充分。全球覆盖范围也不一致。光学立体测绘系统在对比度低和持续云层覆盖的地区，尤其存在控制和匹配困难的问题。雷达干涉测量，例如SRTM任务中使用的技术，克服了这些挑战，提供了一致且高分辨率的数据，不受云层和光照条件的影响。

Definition.QuestionEn: What constitutes a digital elevation model, and what was the objective of creating one for the SRTM mission?
Definition.QuestionCn: 什么是数字高程模型，创建 SRTM 任务的目标是什么？
Definition.AnswerEn: A digital elevation model (DEM) is a representation of Earth's surface topography. The objective of creating a DEM for the SRTM mission was to acquire high-resolution elevation data for all land between about 60° north latitude and 56° south latitude, covering approximately 80% of Earth's land surface. This endeavor aimed to produce a consistent and comprehensive global map set, which was challenging and expensive to achieve with conventional mapping technologies.
Definition.AnswerCn: 数字高程模型（DEM）是地球表面地形的表示。创建SRTM任务的DEM的目的是获取大约60°北纬和56°南纬之间所有陆地的高分辨率高程数据，覆盖地球陆地表面的约80%。这一努力旨在制作一套一致且全面的全球地图集，而使用传统测绘技术实现这一目标是具有挑战性和昂贵的。

Comparison.QuestionEn: How do the data collection techniques of synthetic aperture radar (SAR) interferometry compare to conventional topographic mapping technologies in terms of global coverage and resolution?
Comparison.QuestionCn: 合成孔径雷达（SAR）干涉测量的数据收集技术与传统地形测绘技术在全球覆盖范围和分辨率方面有何比较？
Comparison.AnswerEn: Synthetic aperture radar (SAR) interferometry, as utilized in the Shuttle Radar Topography Mission (SRTM), offers more consistent global coverage and resolution compared to conventional topographic mapping technologies. Conventional methods often result in maps of uneven quality, with some regions having high accuracy and others being less adequate. SAR interferometry efficiently produces a global digital elevation model, overcoming the challenges and expenses associated with traditional methods.
Comparison.AnswerCn: 合成孔径雷达（SAR）干涉测量技术在航天飞机雷达地形测量任务（SRTM）中应用，提供了比传统地形测绘技术更一致的全球覆盖和分辨率。传统方法往往导致地图质量不均，有些地区的精度较高，而其他地区则较差。SAR干涉测量有效地生成全球数字高程模型，克服了传统方法所面临的挑战和费用。

Comparison.QuestionEn: In what ways do the challenges of producing a digital elevation model using optical stereo mapping systems differ from those faced by synthetic aperture radar (SAR) interferometry?
Comparison.QuestionCn: 使用光学立体测绘系统生成数字高程模型的挑战与合成孔径雷达（SAR）干涉测量所面临的挑战有何不同？
Comparison.AnswerEn: Optical stereo mapping systems face challenges such as poor control and matching difficulties in areas of low contrast and issues with persistent cloud cover, which hinder mapping in many important regions. In contrast, synthetic aperture radar (SAR) interferometry, used in the SRTM, effectively mitigates these challenges by using phase-difference measurements to capture topography, enabling more reliable data collection regardless of optical conditions.
Comparison.AnswerCn: 光学立体测绘系统面临着诸如低对比度区域的控制和匹配困难以及持续云层覆盖等挑战，这些问题阻碍了许多重要地区的测绘。相比之下，合成孔径雷达（SAR）干涉测量技术在SRTM中有效地缓解了这些挑战，通过使用相位差测量来捕捉地形，使得在光学条件不佳的情况下也能更可靠地收集数据。

Comparison.QuestionEn: What are the differences and similarities in data volume and processing between C radar and X radar used in the Shuttle Radar Topography Mission?
Comparison.QuestionCn: 在航天飞机雷达地形测量任务中，C波段雷达和X波段雷达在数据量和处理方面的异同是什么？
Comparison.AnswerEn: The Shuttle Radar Topography Mission produced a total data volume of 12.3 Tb, with 8.6 Tb from C radar and 3.7 Tb from X radar. The C radar was used in more data takes (399 C radar only and 365 simultaneous with X radar) compared to the X radar (1 X radar only). The X radar had a slightly higher resolution and better signal-to-noise ratio due to its experimental nature and lack of ScanSAR use, compared to the C radar.
Comparison.AnswerCn: 航天飞机雷达地形测量任务产生了总数据量为12.3 Tb，其中C雷达的数据为8.6 Tb，X雷达的数据为3.7 Tb。C雷达的数据采集次数更多（399次仅使用C雷达，365次与X雷达同时使用），而X雷达仅有1次仅使用X雷达。由于X雷达的实验性质和未使用ScanSAR，其分辨率略高，信噪比更好，相较于C雷达。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: What are the implications of the data acquisition rates of C radar and X radar on the overall quality and resolution of the digital elevation models generated?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: C雷达和X雷达的数据采集速率对生成的数字高程模型的整体质量和分辨率有什么影响？
Interpretation.AnswerEn: The data acquisition rates of 180 Mbps for C radar and 90 Mbps for X radar imply that the C radar was designed to generate contiguous mapping coverage as per mission objectives, while the X radar, with a slightly higher resolution and better signal-to-noise ratio, served as an experimental demonstration. These differences in data rates and radar characteristics affect the quality and resolution of the resulting digital elevation models, with X radar potentially providing finer details.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: C雷达的数据采集速率为180 Mbps，而X雷达的数据采集速率为90 Mbps，这意味着C雷达的设计目的是根据任务目标生成连续的测绘覆盖，而X雷达则由于具有稍高的分辨率和更好的信噪比，作为实验演示。这些数据速率和雷达特性上的差异影响了生成的数字高程模型的质量和分辨率，X雷达可能提供更精细的细节。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: In what ways can the data processing techniques employed post-acquisition enhance the reliability of digital elevation models derived from radar data?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 后处理阶段采用的数据处理技术如何增强从雷达数据衍生的数字高程模型的可靠性？
Interpretation.AnswerEn: Post-acquisition data processing techniques, such as accurate measurement of the interferometer baseline and removal of variability and decorrelation due to pass-to-pass observations, are crucial for enhancing the reliability of digital elevation models. These techniques ensure systematic effects are accurately accounted for, contributing to a dataset that is suitable for automated production and consistent in quality.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: 后收购数据处理技术，如对干涉仪基线的准确测量以及去除由于逐次观测引起的变异性和去相关性，对于提高数字高程模型的可靠性至关重要。这些技术确保系统效应得到准确考虑，从而有助于生成适合自动化生产且质量一致的数据集。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What factors contribute to the challenges of producing a global digital elevation model with consistent scale and resolution?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 影响生产具有一致比例和分辨率的全球数字高程模型的挑战因素包括哪些？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: The challenges of producing a global digital elevation model with consistent scale and resolution stem from conventional topographic mapping technologies, which have resulted in maps of uneven quality, with some having high accuracy and others less adequate. Additionally, global coverage has been uneven and optical stereo mapping systems face difficulties with control and matching in areas of low contrast and persistent cloud cover.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 生产全球数字高程模型时，面临着一致的比例和分辨率的挑战，这源于传统地形测绘技术，这些技术导致了地图质量不均，有些地图具有高精度，而其他地图则不够充分。此外，全球覆盖也不均匀，光学立体测绘系统在低对比度和持续云层覆盖的地区面临控制和匹配的困难。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: Why was the emergence of synthetic aperture radar (SAR) interferometry significant for global digital elevation model creation?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 合成孔径雷达（SAR）干涉测量的出现为何对全球数字高程模型的创建具有重要意义？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: The emergence of synthetic aperture radar (SAR) interferometry was significant because it allowed for the efficient and affordable creation of a global digital elevation model. This technology uses phase-difference measurements from two radar images with a very small base to height ratio, making it possible to measure topography accurately and overcome the limitations of conventional mapping systems.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 合成孔径雷达（SAR）干涉测量的出现具有重要意义，因为它使得高效且经济地创建全球数字高程模型成为可能。这项技术利用来自两幅具有非常小基线高度比的雷达图像的相位差测量，使得能够准确测量地形，并克服传统测绘系统的局限性。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What were the reasons for including both C band and X band radar systems in the SRTM mission?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 在SRTM任务中同时包含C波段和X波段雷达系统的原因是什么？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: The inclusion of both C band and X band radar systems in the SRTM mission was based on the objective to acquire a comprehensive digital elevation model. The C radar aimed to generate contiguous mapping coverage, while the X band radar, included as an experimental demonstration, offered a slightly higher resolution and better signal-to-noise ratio, enhancing the data quality and coverage achieved by the mission.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: SRTM任务中同时包含C波段和X波段雷达系统的目的是为了获取全面的数字高程模型。C波段雷达旨在生成连续的测绘覆盖，而X波段雷达作为实验性演示，提供了稍高的分辨率和更好的信噪比，从而提高了任务所获得的数据质量和覆盖范围。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: What is the impact on digital elevation model consistency when using interferometric SAR data versus conventional topographic mapping methods?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 使用干涉合成孔径雷达（SAR）数据与传统地形测绘方法相比，对数字高程模型一致性的影响是什么？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: Using interferometric SAR data allows for a more consistent global digital elevation model as it can efficiently and affordably create maps at a consistent scale and resolution, overcoming the uneven quality and high cost associated with conventional methods.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 使用干涉合成孔径雷达（SAR）数据可以更一致地生成全球数字高程模型，因为它能够以一致的尺度和分辨率高效且经济地创建地图，从而克服传统方法所带来的不均匀质量和高成本问题。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: How does the inclusion of X radar as an experimental demonstration affect the overall data quality and resolution in a dataset?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: X雷达作为实验演示的纳入如何影响数据集的整体数据质量和分辨率？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: The inclusion of X radar, despite not employing ScanSAR, results in a slightly higher resolution and better signal-to-noise ratio (SNR) than the C band system, which enhances the overall data quality and resolution of the dataset.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 尽管X波段雷达没有采用ScanSAR，但其分辨率略高，信噪比（SNR）也更好，这提升了数据集的整体数据质量和分辨率。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: What are the potential challenges encountered during data acquisition for creating a digital elevation model with high-resolution interferometric SAR data?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 在使用高分辨率干涉合成孔径雷达数据创建数字高程模型的过程中，可能遇到哪些挑战？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: Challenges include variability and decorrelation due to pass-to-pass observations, as well as the need for accurate measurement of the interferometer baseline and other systematic effects at all times during data acquisition to ensure the production of a suitable dataset.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 挑战包括由于逐次观测导致的变异性和去相关性，以及在数据采集期间始终需要准确测量干涉仪基线和其他系统效应，以确保生成合适的数据集。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: What is the primary objective behind utilizing synthetic aperture radar interferometry for global digital elevation model creation?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 利用合成孔径雷达干涉测量法创建全球数字高程模型的主要目标是什么？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: The primary objective is to efficiently and affordably create a global digital elevation model that covers all land between about 60° north latitude and 56° south latitude, which accounts for about 80% of the Earth’s land surface.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 主要目标是高效且经济地创建一个覆盖大约60°北纬和56°南纬之间所有陆地的全球数字高程模型，这大约占地球陆地表面的80%。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: Why was it necessary to employ both C and X radar systems during the Shuttle Radar Topography Mission?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 在航天飞机雷达地形测量任务中，为什么有必要同时使用C波段和X波段雷达系统？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: The use of C and X radar systems was crucial because C radar aimed to generate contiguous mapping coverage, while the X radar, although experimental, offered a slightly higher resolution and better signal-to-noise ratio, thus enhancing the quality and scope of data acquisition.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: C雷达系统的使用至关重要，因为C雷达旨在生成连续的映射覆盖，而X雷达虽然是实验性的，但提供了稍高的分辨率和更好的信噪比，从而增强了数据采集的质量和范围。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: What are the intended outcomes of overcoming the challenges posed by conventional topographic mapping technologies in creating a digital elevation model?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 克服传统地形测绘技术所带来的挑战，以创建数字高程模型的预期结果是什么？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: The intended outcomes include achieving a consistent scale and resolution across the global elevation model, overcoming the uneven quality of previous mapping technologies, and providing reliable data even in areas with persistent cloud cover or low contrast, which traditional optical methods struggled to map effectively.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 预期成果包括在全球高程模型中实现一致的尺度和分辨率，克服以往测绘技术的质量不均问题，并在持续云层覆盖或低对比度的区域提供可靠数据，而传统光学方法在这些区域的测绘效果较差。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What are the specific steps involved in using synthetic aperture radar (SAR) interferometry for global digital elevation model (DEM) creation?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 使用合成孔径雷达(SAR)干涉测量创建全球数字高程模型(DEM)的具体步骤是什么?
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: Synthetic aperture radar (SAR) interferometry, or InSAR, involves using phase-difference measurements derived from two radar images acquired with a small base to height ratio (typically 0.0002) to measure topography. The process includes removing variability and decorrelation from pass-to-pass observations and ensuring accurate measurements of the interferometer baseline and systematic effects during data acquisition.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 合成孔径雷达干涉测量（SAR干涉测量，InSAR）涉及使用从两幅以小基线高比（通常为0.0002）获取的雷达图像中得出的相位差测量来测量地形。该过程包括去除来自不同观测之间的变异性和去相关性，并确保在数据采集过程中准确测量干涉仪基线和系统效应。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: How does the mapping process ensure the removal of variability and decorrelation in data acquisition for a digital elevation model?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 映射过程如何确保在数字高程模型的数据采集过程中去除变异性和去相关性？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: The mapping process ensures the removal of variability and decorrelation by focusing on accurate measurement of the interferometer baseline and other systematic effects throughout the data acquisition phase. This careful management allows for consistent and reliable data suitable for automated production of digital elevation models.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 映射过程通过关注干涉仪基线的准确测量和数据采集阶段的其他系统效应，确保了变异性的消除和去相关。这种细致的管理使得数据一致可靠，适合于数字高程模型的自动化生产。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What procedural steps are taken to manage data volume during the acquisition of radar data for a digital elevation model?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 在获取用于数字高程模型的雷达数据过程中，采取哪些步骤来管理数据量？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: During the acquisition of radar data, the data were acquired at rates of 180 megabits per second (Mbps) for C radar and 90 Mbps for X radar, resulting in a total data volume of 12.3 Tb, with 8.6 Tb by C radar and 3.7 Tb by X radar. Selected snapshots were downlinked via the shuttle Ku band and NASA’s tracking and data relay system (TDRS) link to the Jet Propulsion Laboratory (JPL) in Pasadena and to the Payload Operations Control Center (POCC) in Houston for near-real-time performance assessment.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 在雷达数据采集过程中，C雷达以180兆比特每秒（Mbps）的速率采集数据，X雷达以90 Mbps的速率采集数据，最终数据总量为12.3太比特，其中C雷达占8.6太比特，X雷达占3.7太比特。选定的快照通过航天飞机的Ku波段和美国国家航空航天局（NASA）的跟踪和数据中继系统（TDRS）链接下传至位于帕萨迪纳的喷气推进实验室（JPL）和位于休斯顿的有效载荷操作控制中心（POCC），以进行近实时性能评估。

Enablement.QuestionEn: What technological advancements enabled the efficient and affordable creation of a global digital elevation model using synthetic aperture radar (SAR) interferometry?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 哪些技术进步使得利用合成孔径雷达（SAR）干涉测量法高效且经济地创建全球数字高程模型成为可能？
Enablement.AnswerEn: The emergence of synthetic aperture radar (SAR) interferometry in the 1990s made it possible to efficiently and affordably create a global digital elevation model. Interferometric SAR, or InSAR, uses phase-difference measurements from two radar images with a very small base to height ratio to measure topography.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 合成孔径雷达（SAR）干涉测量技术在1990年代的出现，使得高效且经济地创建全球数字高程模型成为可能。干涉合成孔径雷达（InSAR）利用两幅雷达图像的相位差测量，采用非常小的基线高度比来测量地形。

Enablement.QuestionEn: What challenges did conventional topographic mapping technologies face that were overcome by the Shuttle Radar Topography Mission's approach?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 传统地形测绘技术面临的挑战是什么，这些挑战是如何被航天飞机雷达地形测量任务的方法克服的？
Enablement.AnswerEn: Conventional topographic mapping technologies faced challenges such as producing maps of uneven quality and inconsistent global coverage. They also struggled with control and matching difficulties in areas of low contrast and persistent cloud cover. The Shuttle Radar Topography Mission overcame these challenges through the use of interferometric SAR, which allowed for consistent scale and resolution in mapping.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 传统的地形测绘技术面临着生产质量不均和全球覆盖不一致的挑战。它们在低对比度和持续云层覆盖的地区也遇到了控制和匹配的困难。航天飞机雷达地形测量任务通过使用干涉合成孔径雷达（SAR）克服了这些挑战，从而在测绘中实现了一致的比例和分辨率。

Expectation.QuestionEn: Why might the use of conventional topographic mapping technologies lead to inconsistent global digital elevation models?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 使用传统地形测绘技术可能导致全球数字高程模型不一致的原因是什么？
Expectation.AnswerEn: Conventional topographic mapping technologies have produced maps of uneven quality due to various factors, such as differing levels of accuracy and challenges with global coverage. These methods struggle with consistent scale and resolution, are costly, and suffer from issues like poor control in low-contrast areas and cloud cover.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 传统的地形测绘技术由于各种因素，产生了质量不均的地图，例如不同的精度水平和全球覆盖的挑战。这些方法在一致的比例和分辨率方面存在困难，成本高昂，并且在低对比度区域和云层覆盖等问题上表现不佳。

Expectation.QuestionEn: What are the expected challenges in using SAR interferometry for creating a global digital elevation model?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 使用SAR干涉测量创建全球数字高程模型的预期挑战有哪些？
Expectation.AnswerEn: SAR interferometry, while promising, faces challenges such as the need to remove variability and decorrelation from pass-to-pass observations and accurately measuring the interferometer baseline. These are critical for ensuring the automated production of a consistent dataset.
Expectation.AnswerCn: SAR干涉测量虽然前景广阔，但面临着一些挑战，例如需要去除不同观测之间的变异性和去相关性，以及准确测量干涉仪基线。这些对于确保一致数据集的自动化生产至关重要。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: What are the challenges faced in ensuring consistent scale and resolution across a global digital elevation model using radar technology?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: 确保全球数字高程模型在使用雷达技术时保持一致的尺度和分辨率面临的挑战有哪些？
Judgmental.AnswerEn: Conventional topographic mapping technologies have produced maps of uneven quality, with some areas having astounding accuracy while others are less adequate. The global coverage has been uneven, making it difficult and expensive to produce a global map set or digital elevation model with consistent scale and resolution using traditional methods. Additionally, optical stereo mapping systems face issues such as poor control, matching difficulties in areas of low contrast, and persistent cloud cover in important areas.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: 传统的地形测绘技术产生的地图质量参差不齐，一些地区的精度惊人，而其他地区则较为不足。全球覆盖不均，使得使用传统方法制作具有一致比例和分辨率的全球地图集或数字高程模型变得困难且昂贵。此外，光学立体测绘系统面临着控制不良、在低对比度区域匹配困难以及在重要区域持续云层覆盖等问题。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: How effective do you find synthetic aperture radar (SAR) interferometry in overcoming the limitations of traditional topographic mapping techniques?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: 您认为合成孔径雷达（SAR）干涉测量在克服传统地形测绘技术的局限性方面有多有效？
Judgmental.AnswerEn: Synthetic aperture radar (SAR) interferometry, or InSAR, emerged in the 1990s and offered a more efficient and affordable method to create a global digital elevation model. InSAR uses phase-difference measurements from two radar images acquired with a very small base to height ratio to measure topography, which overcomes some limitations of conventional mapping techniques, such as inconsistent quality and challenging conditions for optical systems.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: 合成孔径雷达干涉测量（SAR干涉测量，或称InSAR）在1990年代出现，提供了一种更高效和经济的方法来创建全球数字高程模型。InSAR利用从两幅以非常小的基线高度比获取的雷达图像中测量的相位差异，来测量地形，这克服了传统测绘技术的一些局限性，例如质量不一致和光学系统在恶劣条件下的挑战。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: What potential improvements could be made to data acquisition processes to enhance the quality and reliability of datasets derived from spaceborne radar missions?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: 可以对数据采集过程进行哪些潜在改进，以提高源自星载雷达任务的数据集的质量和可靠性？
Judgmental.AnswerEn: The key to successful data acquisition for automated production is to remove variability and decorrelation due to pass-to-pass observations and to accurately measure the interferometer baseline and other systematic effects throughout data acquisition. Improvements could involve refining these processes to ensure more consistent and reliable datasets.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: 成功的数据采集对于自动化生产的关键在于消除由于逐次观测造成的变异性和去相关性，并在数据采集过程中准确测量干涉仪基线及其他系统效应。改进措施可以包括优化这些过程，以确保数据集更加一致和可靠。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I don't understand how the use of synthetic aperture radar interferometry can efficiently create a global digital elevation model.
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我不明白合成孔径雷达干涉测量如何有效地创建全球数字高程模型。
Assertion.AnswerEn: Synthetic aperture radar interferometry uses phase-difference measurements from two radar images acquired with a very small base to height ratio to measure topography, enabling efficient and affordable creation of a global digital elevation model.
Assertion.AnswerCn: 合成孔径雷达干涉测量利用从两幅以非常小的基线高度比获取的雷达图像中测量的相位差，来测量地形，从而高效且经济地创建全球数字高程模型。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I'm unsure about the challenges that conventional topographic mapping technologies face in producing a consistent global map set.
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我对传统地形测绘技术在制作一致的全球地图集时面临的挑战感到不确定。
Assertion.AnswerEn: Conventional topographic mapping technologies produce maps of uneven quality and global coverage, making it difficult and expensive to create a consistent scale and resolution map set. Optical stereo mapping systems particularly struggle with control and matching in low contrast areas and persistent cloud cover.
Assertion.AnswerCn: 传统的地形测绘技术产生的地图质量和全球覆盖范围不均匀，这使得创建一致的比例和分辨率地图集变得困难且昂贵。光学立体测绘系统在低对比度区域和持续的云层覆盖下尤其难以进行控制和匹配。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I can't make sense of how data from the Shuttle Radar Topography Mission was processed into a digital elevation model after acquisition.
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我无法理解航天飞机雷达地形任务的数据是如何在获取后处理成数字高程模型的。
Assertion.AnswerEn: The data acquired by the Shuttle Radar Topography Mission underwent processing over two years to create a digital elevation model, using snapshots and downlinked data for performance assessments and systematic effect measurements to ensure consistency and accuracy.
Assertion.AnswerCn: 由航天飞机雷达地形测量任务获取的数据经过两年的处理，创建了数字高程模型，使用快照和下行数据进行性能评估和系统效应测量，以确保一致性和准确性。

Request/Directive.QuestionEn: Please describe the methodologies used to ensure consistent scale and resolution in digital elevation models derived from satellite radar data.
Request/Directive.QuestionCn: 请描述用于确保从卫星雷达数据衍生的数字高程模型在尺度和分辨率上保持一致的 methodologies。
Request/Directive.AnswerEn: The methodologies include the use of synthetic aperture radar (SAR) interferometry, which employs phase-difference measurements from two radar images with a small base to height ratio to measure topography. Ensuring consistent scale and resolution involves accurately measuring the interferometer baseline and other systematic effects during data acquisition.
Request/Directive.AnswerCn: 这些方法包括使用合成孔径雷达（SAR）干涉测量技术，该技术利用来自两幅具有小基线高度比的雷达图像的相位差测量来测量地形。确保一致的尺度和分辨率需要在数据采集过程中准确测量干涉仪基线和其他系统效应。

Request/Directive.QuestionEn: Please analyze the challenges faced when producing a global digital elevation model using conventional topographic mapping technologies.
Request/Directive.QuestionCn: 分析使用传统地形测绘技术制作全球数字高程模型时面临的挑战。
Request/Directive.AnswerEn: Challenges include producing maps of uneven quality, with some maps having high accuracy and others being inadequate. Conventional mapping methods struggle with global coverage and are often costly. Optical stereo mapping systems face poor control and matching issues in low contrast areas and persistent cloud cover in significant regions.
Request/Directive.AnswerCn: 挑战包括生产质量不均的地图，有些地图具有高精度，而其他地图则不够充分。传统的制图方法在全球覆盖方面存在困难，且通常成本高昂。光学立体制图系统在低对比度区域面临控制和匹配问题，并且在许多地区存在持续的云层覆盖。
